column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////A decent place for deep dish pizza in downtown chicity. I've been here twice
column2: and each time have had a good experience. The service was spot on
column3: and the pizzas came out in the regular 30-45 minute timeframe. The pizza is loaded with cheese
column4: and there is tons of sausage. However
column5: I was a bit disappointed with the amount of sauce. I went through many a bite with only tasting meat and cheese...which while I love me some of that
column6: I also want some sauce. Next time when I'm in Chicago
column7: I'm going to try somewhere else. The pizza was good
column8: but with so many other options in town
column9: it's time to move on and try somewhere new!
